sect2.title: Installation of freetype2
sect2.para: Install freetype2 by running the following commands:

screen.userinput: cp include/freetype/config/ftoption.h include/freetype/config/ftoption.h.orig && sed -e 's:#undef TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER:#define TT_CONFIG_OPTION_BYTECODE_INTERPRETER:' \ include/freetype/config/ftoption.h.orig > include/freetype/config/ftoption.h && ./configure --prefix=/usr && make && make install
